summary: A political thriller during the Wounded Knee insurrection in 1973. Two activist are arrested and maintain in custody in a sheriff's office. They will meet a Nixon advisor, a lawyer, a ... See full summary »
cast: Chadwick Brown|Tonantzin Carmelo|Michael Spears|Ron Roggé|Circus-Szalewski|Alena von Stroheim|Anthony Palermo|Henry LeBlanc|King Orba|Amber Marie Bollinger|Gichi Gamba|Christine Barger|Sue Gisser|Mariah Bonner|Fernando Mark Paiz|Callie Cameron
title: The Activist
